dialogue: Some new readers of this strip may be confused by the presence of a character who looks very much like a potato. The following comparison should clear things up:
Dilbert (turned into a frog and disguised as Prince Charles).

A handy rule for telling which one is a potato is to look for the presence of glasses. Although potatoes do have eyes, they are known to be vain and generally prefer contact lenses. Keep this reference guide with you.
